languages.text: "В случившемся виновата не Кибелла, а вся ваша извращенная философия. Блюстители, приказываю истребить всю Кровавую паутину на моем корабле!"

traits.locale_text: [Казнить культ] "В случившемся виновата не Кибелла, а идеология культа. Кровавая паутина опасна для флагмана".

languages.text: "The blame for what happened lies not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to cull every member of the Bloodspun Web on my ship!"
languages.original_text: "В случившемся виновата не Кибелла, а вся ваша извращенная философия. Блюстители, приказываю истребить всю Кровавую паутину на моем корабле!"

traits.locale_text: "The blame for what happened lies, not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to exterminate all Bloodspun Web members on my ship!"
"The blame for what happened lies, not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to exterminate all Bloodspun Web members on my ship!"
"The blame for what happened lies not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to cull every member of the Bloodspun Web on my ship!"

"The blame for what happened lies not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to cull every member of the Bloodspun Web on my ship!"

languages.text: « La responsabilité de ce qui s'est passé n'incombe pas à Kibellah, mais à votre philosophie perverse. Prévôts, je vous ordonne d'abattre tous les membres de la Toile de Sang présents à bord de mon vaisseau ! »
languages.original_text: "The blame for what happened lies not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to cull every member of the Bloodspun Web on my ship!"

traits.locale_text: « La responsabilité de ce qui s'est passé n'incombe pas à Kibellah, mais à votre philosophie perverse. Prévôts, je vous ordonne d'abattre tous les membres de la Toile de Sang présents à bord de mon vaisseau ! »

languages.text: «La culpa de lo sucedido no es de Kibellah, sino de toda su maldita filosofía. Seguridad, ¡ordeno que se purgue la Red Sanguinolenta de mi nave!».
languages.original_text: "The blame for what happened lies not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to cull every member of the Bloodspun Web on my ship!"

traits.locale_text: «La culpa de lo sucedido no es de Kibellah, sino de toda su maldita filosofía. Seguridad, ¡ordeno que se purgue la Red Sanguinolenta de mi nave!».

languages.text: 「起こったことの責任はキベラではなく、君達の倒錯した信条そのものにある。エンフォーサー、我が船にいるブラッドスパン・ウェブのメンバーを全て淘汰するのだ！」
languages.original_text: "The blame for what happened lies not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to cull every member of the Bloodspun Web on my ship!"

traits.locale_text: 「起こったことの責任はキベラではなく、君達の倒錯した信条そのものにある。エンフォーサー、我が船にいるブラッドスパン・ウェブのメンバーを全て淘汰するのだ！」

languages.text: “这一切的责任根本不在于绮贝菈，而在于你们反常的教条。所有执法者听令，我要求你们把这艘船上所有织血罗网的信徒统统杀光！”
languages.original_text: "The blame for what happened lies not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to cull every member of the Bloodspun Web on my ship!"

traits.locale_text: “这一切的责任根本不在于绮贝菈，而在于你们反常的教条。所有执法者听令，我要求你们把这艘船上所有织血罗网的信徒统统杀光！”

languages.text: "Die Schuld für die Geschehnisse liegt nicht bei Kibellah, sondern bei Eurer gesamten perversen Philosophie. Enforcers, ich befehle Euch, jedes Mitglied des Blutgesponnenen Netzes auf meinem Schiff zu töten!"
languages.original_text: "The blame for what happened lies not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to cull every member of the Bloodspun Web on my ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Schuld für die Geschehnisse liegt nicht bei Kibellah, sondern bei Eurer gesamten perversen Philosophie. Enforcers, ich befehle Euch, jedes Mitglied des Blutgesponnenen Netzes auf meinem Schiff zu töten!"

languages.text: "Yaşananların tek kabahatlisi Kibellah değil, aynı zamanda tüm o sapkın felsefenize de kabahatli. İnfazcılar, size gemimdeki tüm Kanipi Ağı mensuplarını toplamanızı emrediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "The blame for what happened lies not with Kibellah, but with your entire perverse philosophy. Enforcers, I order you to cull every member of the Bloodspun Web on my ship!"
